reviewText: The music & dancing is awesome & so is the storyline
I love this movie so much!
I love the music in this movie. The main characters are likeable and it is a fun movie.

I am a fan of the Bollywood movies and have a small collection I watch off and on.  The story in this one is quite different from the others I have making the movie even more enchanting.  Buy this one and find a new source of entertainment in movies, Bollywood. You will enjoy loads of color and lovely song and dance.  RSBlain
In my top 5 favorite bollywood movies of the last 2 years.  Worth buying the bluray! Stunning...
